author: rchudasa
body:
#### PR description:
@slava77 @echapon 
This PR is a backport of following PRs. 

* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26763 updating SC reg corrector for UL (May 16)
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26892 adding V3 modifier (Jun 13)
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27633 Light by light modifier (Aug 22)
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/27871 tracker cluster cut (Aug 27)
* https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/28051 low-pt regression (Oct 15)

This PR is submitted to reconstruct low pT photons down to 2 GeV for light by light scattering.
title: Backport: Light by light modifier PR 103X
